overview: In part two, Summer's husband is one of the victims in a double homicide, and Jack is the prime suspect. Help unexpectedly comes from his nemesis, Detective Bryce Wilson. Determined to prove Jack's innocence, Bryce finds himself in a deadly cat and mouse game as he races against time, only to discover that an intricate web has been woven to entrap him as well.
title: Summer Madness 2
